description: black; rectangular in shape; flat profile; 2-cut-out shapes on either side of key pad; green numbers on key pad; horizontal screen above key pad; rectangular hand-set; black cord
dimension: 2 x 7 5/8 x 8 in. (5.08 x 19.37 x 20.32 cm) (without cord)
text: The miniaturization of electronic components provided greater license to play with the phone casing itself.  What better device than the telephone to examine the eternal clash between form and function.  In this model the cut-out elements are suggestive of the moderne forms of such British sculptors as Henry Moore and Barbara Hepworth.
title: "Majestic TL-747" push-button desk phone
